query:
SELECT 
  o.orderNumber,
  o.orderDate,
  o.itemsCount as itens_esperados,
  COUNT(s.id) as itens_salvos,
  o.itemsCount - COUNT(s.id) as itens_faltantes
FROM orders o
LEFT JOIN sales s ON o.blingId = s.blingOrderId
WHERE o.orderDate >= '2025-09-01' 
  AND o.orderDate < '2025-10-01'
GROUP BY o.id, o.orderNumber, o.orderDate, o.itemsCount
HAVING itens_faltantes > 0
ORDER BY itens_faltantes DESC
LIMIT 10
command:

  o.orderNumber,
  o.orderDate,
  o.itemsCount as itens_esperados,
  COUNT(s.id) as itens_salvos,
  o.itemsCount - COUNT(s.id) as itens_faltantes
FROM orders o
LEFT JOIN sales s ON o.blingId = s.blingOrderId
WHERE o.orderDate >= '2025-09-01' 
  AND o.orderDate < '2025-10-01'
GROUP BY o.id, o.orderNumber, o.orderDate, o.itemsCount
HAVING itens_faltantes > 0
ORDER BY itens_faltantes DESC
LIMIT 10
